特記事項: 本授業科目は、“オンライン授業60単位制限対象科目”ではありません。 The course is not subject to the 60-credit limit for online courses.
関連科目: 総合日本学習科目（異文化コミュニケーションＡ)／JSC The Study of Intercultural Communication A
授業方法:
• Utilize a wide variety of approach and experiential and interactive activities during the class and focus on student-driven exploration
• Utilize case studies and critical incidents to provide a deeper understanding of the contents and enhance the ability to apply critical thinking
• Work individual, pair or group on topics that relate to contents
• Encouraged to reflect their learning by writing journals
